reviews.review: Great episode overall but wish it was longer as the game was so much fun
You have to play this after the first one.
Holy crap I love this game
Lol. Finished in 4 hours, but enjoyed.
Probably the most essential PC game of all time.
This game turns the Half Life series on it's head. Still waiting for Episode 3.
The ending hits the feels real hard,Valve really showed off the power of the engine with this one. all and all half-life episode two is epic, cant wait for the third one, when l'm 65
Probably the best installment to the Half-Life story, fuck the gnome and get the fuck into space you piece of shit.

G(AY)-MAN

good game it's Weird it remind me of a game that remind me of a game named HALF LIFE 2
Another fun game in the Half-Life universe.  There were a few parts that were a bit ridiculous in difficulty (on Easy...) but for the most part it was time well spent.
I got through this game in one sitting, enjoyed every part of it

It's pretty good. Somewhat short, only took me 4 hours, but it's good.
Seeing the antlion... hive? Den? Nest? whatever it was it was pretty cool.
Had a lot of fun with the car.
8/10 would play again
es half life...digo que mas puedes pedir?
gut game this game is 4 you
A great game with incredible characters and surprisingly good music for those tense moments which appear a lot in episode 2 and that intriguing cliffhanger similiar to episode one except this time...
Shooty things go pew pew. Alyx says things and stuff. Valve counts to two. This Half-Life 2 is the best Half-Life 2.
What's to say? It's Half-life. It simply the best game ever made.
i love it but the ending is sad
Como no recomendar uno de los mejores juegos que hayan existido, de inicio a fin estas bastante pegado al juego. Muy recomendable.
i think this episode is better than the 1st.

Dwarf in the rocket ending is a canon ending, change my mind.

From Episode 1, it was pretty short and basic, it's mostly just tells you what happened for the aftermath of Half-Life 2. But for this Episode, i love that there were trees and environments that looked so beautiful and untouched by the combine, but however, there are aliens still surrounding the world and the animals seemed that they were extinct. And there were new mechanics but appeared like too later to near end of the game, hopefully they'll be back for the next Half-Life game and HOPEFULLY They will be for both, VR and FPS
